output_list.reason: The minting function does not have a check for overflow, allowing the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens to any user account, causing a buyout of the token.
The owner can burn any user's tokens without any checks, allowing the owner to effectively delete any tokens from a user's balance, causing a buyout of the token.
The lend function does not have a check for overflow, allowing users to lend an arbitrary large amount of tokens, causing a buyout of the token.
The repayLoan function does not have a check for overflow, allowing users to repay an arbitrary large amount of tokens, causing a buyout of the token.
The setlvlNfee function does not have a check for overflow, allowing the owner to set the notification fee to a very large value, causing a buyout of the token.
